Columns.Description: Type of agent the data was collected from.
Columns.Name: SourceSystem

Columns.Description: Date and time the record was created.
Columns.Name: TimeGenerated

Columns.Description: Computer/node name in the cluster for which the event applies. If not, computer/node name of sourcing computer
Columns.Name: Computer

Columns.Description: Kind of kubernetes object applicable for the event [event.InvolvedObject.kind] . Ex;- pod
Columns.Name: ObjectKind

Columns.Description: Reason as seen in kubernetes event [event.reason]
Columns.Name: Reason

Columns.Description: Source component that generated the event [event.source.component] . Ex;- default-scheduler
Columns.Name: SourceComponent

Columns.Description: Cumulative count of the number of occurences of a specific event [event.count] .
Columns.Name: Count

Columns.Description: ID of the kubernetes cluster from which the event was sourced
Columns.Name: ClusterName

Columns.Description: ID of the kubernetes cluster from which the event was sourced
Columns.Name: ClusterId

Columns.Description: A unique identifier for the resource that the record is associated with
Columns.Name: _ResourceId

Columns.Description: A unique identifier for the subscription that the record is associated with
Columns.Name: _SubscriptionId
